00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define BUF_SIZE                                  (16)
00048 
00049 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 void SPI_Slave_Configuration(void);
00051 void SPI_Master_Configuration(void);
00052 
00053 void SPI_Loopback_Test(void);
00054 
00055 ErrStatus CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00056 
00057 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 u8 SPI0_Buffer_Tx[BUF_SIZE] = {
00059   0x00, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33,
00060   0x44, 0x55, 0x66, 0x77,
00061   0x88, 0x99, 0xAA, 0xBB,
00062   0xCC, 0xDD, 0xEE, 0xFF
00063 };
00064 
00065 u8 SPI0_Buffer_Rx[BUF_SIZE] = {0};
00066 
00067 u8 SPI1_Buffer_Tx[BUF_SIZE] = {
00068   0xFF, 0xEE, 0xDD, 0xCC,
00069   0xBB, 0xAA, 0x99, 0x88,
00070   0x77, 0x66, 0x55, 0x44,
00071   0x33, 0x22, 0x11, 0x00
00072 };
00073 
00074 u8 SPI1_Buffer_Rx[BUF_SIZE] = {0};

00077 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00078   * @brief  Main program.
00079   * @retval None
00080   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00081 int main(void)
00082 {
00083   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00084   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00085 
00086   SPI_Slave_Configuration();
00087   SPI_Master_Configuration();
00088 
00089   SPI_Loopback_Test();
00090 
00091   while (1);
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  Configure the SPI Slave.
00096   * @retval None
00097   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00098 void SPI_Slave_Configuration(void)
00099 {
00100   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00101     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00102     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                    = 1;
00103     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SPIS_SEL_GPIO_CLK = 1;
00104     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SPIS_IPN          = 1;
00105     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA                    = 1;
00106     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00107   }
00108 
00109   { /* PDMA related settings for SPI Slave                                                                  */
00110 
00111     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00112        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00113        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00114     */
00115     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00116 
00117     /* Slave Slave Tx PDMA channel configuration                                                            */
00118     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &SPI1_Buffer_Tx;
00119     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_SPIS_PORT->DR;
00120     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = BUF_SIZE;
00121     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00122     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00123     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = H_PRIO;
00124     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX;
00125     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_TX, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00126 
00127     /* Slave Slave Rx PDMA channel configuration                                                            */
00128     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_SPIS_PORT->DR;
00129     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &SPI1_Buffer_Rx;
00130     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = VH_PRIO;
00131     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_LIN_INC;
00132     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_RX, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00133 
00134     /* Enable Slave Tx, Rx GE & TC interrupt                                                                */
00135     PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_TX, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00136     PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_RX, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00137 
00138     /* Enable the corresponding PDMA channel                                                                */
00139     PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_TX, ENABLE);
00140     PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_RX, ENABLE);
00141   }
00142 
00143   /* Enable Slave SEL pull up (idle high)                                                                   */
00144   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_SEL_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPIS_SEL_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00145 
00146   /* Configure AFIO mode as SPI function                                                                    */
00147   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_SEL_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_SPIS_SEL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00148   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_SCK_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_SPIS_SCK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00149   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_MOSI_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SPIS_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00150   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIS_MISO_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SPIS_MISO_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00151 
00152   { /* SPI related settings                                                                                 */
00153 
00154     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00155        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00156        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00157     */
00158     SPI_InitTypeDef SPI_InitStructure;
00159 
00160     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_SLAVE;
00161     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_DISABLE;
00162     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00163     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_HARDWARE;
00164     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00165     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_LOW;
00166     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_FIRST;
00167     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00168     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00169     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00170     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 4;
00171     SPI_Init(HTCFG_SPIS_PORT, &SPI_InitStructure);
00172   }
00173 
00174   SPI_Cmd(HTCFG_SPIS_PORT, ENABLE);
00175   SPI_PDMACmd(HTCFG_SPIS_PORT, SPI_PDMAREQ_TX | SPI_PDMAREQ_RX, ENABLE);
00176 }
00177 
00178 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00179   * @brief  Configure the SPI Master.
00180   * @retval None
00181   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00182 void SPI_Master_Configuration(void)
00183 {
00184   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00185     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00186     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO           = 1;
00187     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SPIM_IPN = 1;
00188     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA           = 1;
00189     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00190   }
00191 
00192   { /* PDMA related settings for SPI Master                                                                 */
00193 
00194     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00195        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00196        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00197     */
00198     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00199 
00200     /* Master Master Tx PDMA channel configuration                                                          */
00201     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &SPI0_Buffer_Tx;
00202     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_SPIM_PORT->DR;
00203     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = BUF_SIZE;
00204     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00205     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00206     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = M_PRIO;
00207     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX;
00208     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_TX, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00209 
00210     /* Master Master Rx PDMA channel configuration                                                          */
00211     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_SPIM_PORT->DR;
00212     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &SPI0_Buffer_Rx;
00213     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = VH_PRIO;
00214     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_LIN_INC;
00215     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_RX, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00216 
00217     /* Enable Master Tx, Rx GE & TC interrupt                                                               */
00218     PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_TX, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00219     PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_RX, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00220 
00221     /* Enable the corresponding PDMA channel                                                                */
00222     PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_TX, ENABLE);
00223     PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SPIM_PDMA_RX, ENABLE);
00224   }
00225 
00226   /* Configure AFIO mode as SPI function                                                                    */
00227   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_SEL_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_SPIM_SEL_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00228   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_SCK_GPIO_ID,  HTCFG_SPIM_SCK_AFIO_PIN,   AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00229   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_MOSI_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SPIM_MOSI_AFIO_PIN , AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00230   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPIM_MISO_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SPIM_MISO_AFIO_PIN , AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00231 
00232   { /* SPI related settings                                                                                 */
00233 
00234     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00235        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00236        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00237     */
00238     SPI_InitTypeDef SPI_InitStructure;
00239 
00240     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
00241     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_DISABLE;
00242     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00243     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_HARDWARE;
00244     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00245     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_LOW;
00246     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_FIRST;
00247     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00248     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00249     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00250     SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 4;
00251     SPI_Init(HTCFG_SPIM_PORT, &SPI_InitStructure);
00252   }
00253 
00254   /* Set SS as output mode for slave select                                                                 */
00255   SPI_SELOutputCmd(HTCFG_SPIM_PORT, ENABLE);
00256   SPI_Cmd(HTCFG_SPIM_PORT, ENABLE);
00257   SPI_PDMACmd(HTCFG_SPIM_PORT, SPI_PDMAREQ_TX | SPI_PDMAREQ_RX, ENABLE);
00258 }
00259 
00260 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00261   * @brief  The SPI send data.
00262   * @retval None
00263   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00264 void SPI_Loopback_Test(void)
00265 {
00266   /* Wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00267   while (!PDMA_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_SPIS_PDMA_RX, PDMA_FLAG_TC))
00268   {
00269     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00270   }
00271   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00272 
00273   /* Check on validity of received data on Master & Slave                                                   */
00274   if (CmpBuffer(SPI0_Buffer_Tx, SPI1_Buffer_Rx, BUF_SIZE) == SUCCESS &&
00275       CmpBuffer(SPI1_Buffer_Tx, SPI0_Buffer_Rx, BUF_SIZE) == SUCCESS)
00276   {
00277     /* Turn on LED1 if the transmitted and received data are equal                                          */
00278     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00279   }
00280   else
00281   {
00282     /* Turn on LED2 if the transmitted and received data are different                                      */
00283     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00284   }
00285 }
00286 
00287 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00288   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00289   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00290   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00291   * @retval SUCCESS or ERROR
00292   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00293 ErrStatus CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00294 {
00295   while (BufferLength--)
00296   {
00297     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00298     {
00299       return ERROR;
00300     }
00301 
00302     Buffer1++;
00303     Buffer2++;
00304   }
00305 
00306   return SUCCESS;
00307 }
00308 
00309 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00310 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00311   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00312   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00313   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00314   * @retval None
00315   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00316 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00317 {
00318   /*
00319      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00320      Debug message can be added here.
00321      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00322   */
00323 
00324   while (1)
00325   {
00326   }
00327 }
00328 #endif
